meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4019.

td.p: Emily Karrs, a junior from Gibsonia, Pennsylvania
Blake Hernandez, a senior from Burke, Virginia
Anna Gohmann, a senior from Westlake Village, California

tr.td: DURING THE '90s
CELEBRITIES
LET THE GAMES BEGIN
INVENTORS
WOMEN IN SPORTS
ABBREVIATIONS
